ygData.subject: RE: Various questions forma  young necro
ygData.msgSnippet: In my opinion any aoe spell means a very certain death for you, so I stay away from them.  But from what I remember, when I first got it, it did about 70 pts
ygData.messageBody:
In my opinion any aoe spell means a very certain death for you, so I stay
away from them. But from what I remember, when I first got it, it did about
70 pts dmg per mob, it has been a while though and has been moved to the
back of my spell book gathering dust since.

Oasis is good, usually crowded since everyone is killing crocs, but i hunted
at a couple of good places killing everything but crocs there.

I think you still should be able to buy your pets in neriak nec guild at
your level. The pets may also be in the nec guild in freeport, it may be
easier to ask someone to show you where it is since there are quite a few
turns that you take.

Vanelin Blackheart 32nd level DE Nec, Povar

-----Original Message-----
From: Ben Maddox [mailto:boffinboy@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 11:43 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Various questions forma young necro


From: "Ben Maddox" <boffinboy@...>

HI all, i have recently started my necro and am about to buy my lvl 16
spells I was wondering is infectious cloud worth buying? i know its area
effect and stops regen but what is the damage? I have read conflicting
reports, some saying it is only DD and some saying it is alos 100 dmg DOT,
can anyoen clarify which it is? Also where should i hunt at lvl 13 to get
to 16 fast - i will usually hunt wiht either a lvl 12 monk or druid as my
partner - i hear oasis is good is that right? FInally I hear i can buy my
lvl 16 pet spell in efreeport in some kind of cave, rather than research -
is that correct and if so where is this cave? - Thanks in advance, sorry
for all the questions, just loving my necro! - Malados on SOlusek Ro
server.

This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
